description.raw:
Before this pull request, the artifacts were reported using a special ROS service. Now, the teams report the artifacts via the regular comms. Highlights:

‌

* For convenience, I've added a new function `SendToBaseStation(...)` to report artifacts.
* `SendToBaseStation(...)` sends the artifact to a base station model, which is using the regular comms to receive messages. @ColeOSRF is working on a nicer base station model. ~~I’ll update the mesh when ready~~ . Mesh updated.
* A new protobuf artifact message has been created. The teams need to populate this message before reporting the artifact.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3949098684-base_station.png)
‌

**Reminder**: Update documentation when this pull request is merged.
